channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Dreamweaver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Dreamweaver

item.title: CVE-2020-24425|2024-08-04T15:12:08.970Z -- adobe -- dreamweaver
item.description: Dreamweaver version 20.2 (and earlier) is affected by an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability that could lead to privilege escalation. Successful exploitation could result in a local user with permissions to write to the file system running system commands with administrator privileges.
